data.title: Robert De Niro on Martin Scorsese and a New Baby at 80
data.meta_description: The actor reflects on 50 years of working with Martin Scorsese and opens up about his seventh child, born in April 2023. He was named best supporting actor in this year’s AARP Movies for Grownups Awards for his role in “Killers of the Flower Moon.”
data.text:
4:01

The legendary actor reflects on 50 years of working with director Martin Scorsese and opens up about his seventh child, born in April 2023. De Niro was named best supporting actor in this year’s AARP Movies for Grownups Awards for his role in “Killers of the Flower Moon.”

All Featured Videos

Robert De Niro on Martin Scorsese and a New Baby at 80

The legendary actor reflects on 50 years of working with director Martin Scorsese and opens up about his seventh child, born in April 2023. De Niro was named best supporting actor in this year’s AARP Movies for Grownups Awards for his role in “Killers of the Flower Moon.”
